scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity of Christ. The Virgin Mary, in a blue robe and golden mantle, kneels with her hands clasped in prayer before the Christ Child, who lies in a manger. Saint Joseph, with a halo and praying hands, stands to the right. A donkey and an ox are present in the foreground. Behind them, a rustic wooden structure with a thatched roof is visible, and beyond that, a walled city with towers and spires is depicted in the distance. Above, angels sing "Gloria in excelsis Deo" from a scroll.
